text: Pedro Hernández (born 19 March 1955) is a Cuban fencer. He competed at the 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Cuban male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Cuba Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in fencing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Cuba Category:Fencers at the 1979 Pan American Games
title: Pedro Hernández (fencer)
